mapper.select: select average_price from county_price_statistics where city=#{city} and county=#{county} and statistical_time > #{time} order by statistical_time desc limit 1

select county_price_statistics.county as 'county', county_price_statistics.average_price as 'averagePrice', county_price_statistics.week_growth_rate as 'weekGrowthRate', county_price_statistics.statistical_time as 'statisticalTime' from county_price_statistics, (select county, MAX(statistical_time) as max_time from county_price_statistics where city = #{city} group by county) as tmp where county_price_statistics.city = #{city} and county_price_statistics.county = tmp.county and county_price_statistics.statistical_time = tmp.max_time
